ai-thag10.3:1.1_0: If you’re prepared for the future,
ai-thag10.3:1.2_0: both the good and the bad,
ai-thag10.3:1.3_0: then those who look for your weakness,
ai-thag10.3:1.4_0: whether enemies or well-wishers, will find none.
ai-thag10.3:2.4_0: as it was taught by the Buddha:
ai-thag10.3:2.6_0: like the moon released from the image.
ai-thag10.3:3.3_0: it has broken through and been uplifted—
ai-thag10.3:6.1_0: It’s not a teaching just for today;
ai-thag10.3:7.3_0: Everyone who is born here dies here;
ai-thag10.3:7.4_0: for living beings on the teaching.
ai-thag10.3:8.1_0: The things that are useful for the living
ai-thag10.3:8.2_0: are of no use for the dead—not fame, not celebrity,
ai-thag10.3:8.3_0: not praise by ascetics and brahmins.
ai-thag10.3:8.4_0: For the dead, there is only weeping.
ai-thag10.3:9.1_0: And weeping impairs the eye and the body;
ai-thag10.3:9.4_0: but your well-wishers are not happy.
ai-thag10.3:10.1_0: So you should wish that those who stay in your family
ai-thag10.3:10.3_0: and do their duty through the power of wisdom,
ai-thag10.3:10.4_0: just as you’d cross a full river by boat.
